members.joinCircumstances: Introduced as the shadowed leader of the New Fish-Man Pirates.
Introduced confronting the Straw Hat Pirates as they approach Fish-Man Island.
Introduced as the crew's assassin and the best swordsman on Fish-Man Island.
Introduced alongside Hammond and Hyouzou confronting the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Confront Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Members of the New Fish-Man Pirates, led by Hammond, confront the Straw Hat Pirates as they approach Fish-Man Island, riding sea beasts.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of the arc's antagonist crew and establishment of conflict.

keyMoments.title: Ultimatum to the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Hammond, representing the New Fish-Man Pirates, gives the Straw Hats an ultimatum to join them or die.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's aggressive stance toward outsiders and their awareness of the Straw Hats' reputation.

keyMoments.title: Hody Jones Revealed as Leader
keyMoments.description: Hammond reports to the shadowed Hody Jones, revealing him as the captain of the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the arc's main antagonist and establishes the crew's command structure.

bases.description: The district on Fish-Man Island where Hody Jones and the New Fish-Man Pirates are based.
